txt.en: Raise heraldry of the Thíuda in Arandor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Good places to raise the heraldry of the Thíuda can be found in Arandor.\n\nYou should raise the heraldry of the Thíuda for Huneric.
'The banners of my people will lift the hearts of all who fight for the Great Alliance.'

'The Thíuda are a proud people. When I see one of our banners proudly riding the wind, I take on the courage of ten Men! Take this heraldry of my people and plant it throughout the Kingsland of Arandor. May it lessen the courage of our foes and bring strength to our fellows!'
Huneric, Lord of the Thíuda, seeks to plant the heraldry of the Thíuda throughout Arandor.
Huneric can be found in Adambel.\n\nYou should talk to Huneric.
'The banners of my people will lift the hearts of all who fight for the Great Alliance, and lend them the courage they will need to face the Storm of Wrath!'
